ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:51:04 [Issue ID 4000-740684] urn:comicvine:4000-740684 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 21:29:33. [Issue ID 2082501]
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC! Perfect jumping-on point! What in the HELL are Vampirella and Red Sonja doing in 1920s New York City, WHAT did they do to piss off gangsters, and WHERE are they going next, IF they even SURVIVE!?!?!
